Html:
Hi,

i wish in the Buff menu of rawr, that there is a priority list of buffs that will push my own dps.

Then i know instantly, without clicking lots of buffs, which class i will need for the raid for much more dps.

E.g. like this:

my overall dps 3156 with out any buffs (only self buffs)

1. Horn of Winter (Death Knight) + 255 dps

2. True Shot aura (MM Hunter) + 230 dps

and so on.

On the chart's menu, select Buffs: All Buffs.

This should hopefully give you the display your looking for.
